title: Overpowered Primordial Monarch Core (Part 1)
body:
Overpowered Primordial Monarch Core (Part 1)

In the middle of the desert, Evan watched as an elf holding a bow materialised in front of him.

Beginner Level Elf Puppetâ€”

Strength: 20

Agility: 22

Endurance: 20

World Essence: 23

Stamina: 20

Intelligence: 20

Evan looked at the window that was floating above the elf and raised an eyebrow in surprise.

"This elf puppet is the same level as me but the difference in stat points between us is huge.." Evan muttered in a low voice, seeing the stats of the elf.

After a few seconds, the status window showing the puppet's details disappeared and the elf finally moved.

Seeing the elf moving, Evan did not do anything and just stood in the same place because he wanted to test out something.

With lightning speed, the elf aimed his bow at Evan. The wind from the surroundings moved and in less than a second, a green arrow filled with sharp wind energy formed inside it.

Woosh!
